casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gabriel A. FERRARI 277P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Gabriel Adrian Ferrari, for Gabriel A. Ferrari. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of January 2019 by Defendant to Protest Against Defendant Political Religious Persecution, False Accusation, Coverup Intimidation in the Case of Lee Haney Ret. Army Col. Death by Arson:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
